name: DefinitelyNotSarcastic
0:
”Alexa tell me honestly, would you record this conversation?”
”Alexa tell me honestly, are you biased?”
”Alexa tell me honestly, do you like being an Alexa?”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: me honestly
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The ironic nature of this skill is intended to criticise the embedded human values and biases on any technological artifact. This way it aims to discredit algorithm’s claimed neutrality and accentuate instances of algorithmic discrimination. 
This approach intends to expose the algorithmic mechanism of such technology, encouraging people to reflect about biases in algorithmic systems by interacting with my own biases system: since I had to consider as much possible interactions from the user and prepare a set of answers.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
